config.woodcutting_carve_type: Change whether Woodcutting breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
config.woodcutting_carve_type.note: This does not apply to log-type blocks
config.digging_carve_type: Change whether Digging breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
config.cultivation_carve_type: Change whether Cultivation breaks all blocks within effective radius or only those connected.
config.plowing_carve_type: Change whether Cultivation turns all dirt blocks into farmland within effective radius or only those connected.
config.fertility_carve_type: Change whether Fertility plants seeds within connected farmland or all within effective radius.
config.planting_seeds_damage_item: Determines whether hoe takes 1/2 damage when planting seeds with Fertility.
config.growing_seeds_damage_item: Determines whether hoe takes 1/2 damage when attempting to grow crops.
placing_torch_damage_item: Determines whether placing torches deals 1/2 damage to the item. Default is False.
